borrowSection.title: Borrow with Flexible Rates to Trade or Stake and Maximize Returns.

item1.ques: What is crypto staking and how does it work?
item1.ans: Staking is the process of locking up your cryptocurrency to support the operations of a blockchain network. In return, you earn rewards—similar to earning interest. By staking your assets, you're helping validate transactions and secure the network. The longer you stake, the more rewards you can accumulate, depending on the token and network conditions.

borrowSection.title: Borrow or Lend at a Fixed Interest Rate You Choose

oOrders.label: Ongoing Orders
oOrders.content: Check, adjust LTV, and repay matched orders

howItWorks.title: How Do Fixed Rate Loans Work?

step1.title: 1. Order placing
step1.content: Place a Borrow Order or select an existing order from the Borrow Market.

step2.title: 2. Select Collateral
step2.content: Select collateral asset(s) from the list of your spot wallet assets. The Loan-to-Value (LTV) should be lower than the Initial LTV.

step3.title: 3. Confirm Order
step3.content: Confirm the order details, including the estimated interest, terms, Margin Call LTV, etc. Your collateral assets will be frozen in your spot wallet once the order is placed.

step4.title: 4. Order Matchedg
step4.content: Once matched, your collateral moves to Binance custody, and you receive the borrowed amount (minus interest) in your spot wallet. Monitor LTV to avoid liquidation.

step5.title: 5. Repayment
step5.content: Repay by the expiry date to avoid penalties. After expiry, a 3x interest penalty applies hourly for 24 hours, then your collateral may be liquidated.

adv1.title: Stable and Predictable Costs for Borrowers
adv1.content: Lock in a fixed APR for a set duration, eliminating fluctuations and unexpected costs.

adv2.title: Efficient Automated Process
adv2.content: Enjoy easy, and automated borrowing and lending experience with auto-repay and auto-renew options available.

adv3.title: Attractive Fixed APR for Suppliers
adv3.content: Supply your assets for a customizable and fixed APR.

adv4.title: Multi-Asset Collateral
adv4.content: Borrowers can set multiple assets as collateral to reduce the risk of liquidation.
